title: Stable Amazon Business In Booming Yoga Niche
text: Questions Business Summary For sale is an Amazon driven business selling yoga products (towels, mats, blocks) and a kitchenware product (nut milk bags). The businesses sell outside of Amazon but 95% of the revenue is Amazon revenue. There are also a few top ranking listings that drive the sales process. This business is positioned well in the growing yoga and natural health markets. The customers love the value driven eco-friendly products and respond very well to new products. Customers also love the brand and have strong brand and product loyalty. The owner has plans to expand into the yoga pants market. The yoga pants product is in development and is approximately 50% completed (prints are done). This product represents a huge growth opportunity based on the size of the market. Highlights & Key Assets: o Top Amazon listing health with strong review scores and keyword rankings. o The Amazon model is very hands off, so it is an easy business to manage for operations, sales, and finance. o Very solid operations and finance side of the business with strong management systems, KPI systems, reporting systems, and outsourced team in the Philippines for all areas of the business. o Business is running very smoothly and relatively on autopilot (in terms of owner involvement). o Products and brand that customers love. Upcoming Yoga pants product is expected to be well received. o Both Amazon (eCommerce) and Yoga are high growth markets currently with no signs of slowing down. Intellectual Property: > Trademarks > 500 page+ internal wiki that has ALL the processes for the company, ie. the blueprint for every system/process in the company. > Dropbox and Google Drive with all the digital assets > Asana.com workspace with all strategy Financials
